title: Close to Kroger 2 bed 2 bath
posting_body: Quiet location in Frayser close to the Nike plant and services.
Walking distance to shopping, banking, restaurants as well as being right on the bus line.
All units are well appointed and updated with all appliances included.
Owner provides water and trash service for this unit.
To apply, you must bring valid ID as well as 2 or more paystubs.
Minimum income requirement is 2.5 times your rent.
The application fee is $25 per person over the age of 18 years.
We do credit and background screening.
Evictions within the last year are not accepted.
Bankruptcies may be accepted on a case by case basis however deposit may be adjusted accordingly.
Security deposit $350-$550 depending on rental history.
